biography.bio: Fernando Amaral is an actor, known for Norberto's Deadline (2010), El Candidato (2016) and Las toninas van al Este (2016).
biography.name: Fernando Amaral

biography.bio: Mora Arenillas is an actress, known for Por un tiempo (2013), Historias Breves IX: Videojuegos (2014) and Historias Breves 9 (2014).
biography.name: Mora Arenillas

biography.bio: Jorgelina Aruzzi is an actress, known for Los vecinos en guerra (2013), Corazón de león (2013) and The Chairwoman (2012).
biography.name: Jorgelina Aruzzi

biography.bio: María José Gabín is an actress, known for Savage Attraction (2001), Hidden River (1999) and Neighbours (1999).
biography.name: María José Gabín

biography.bio: Tamara Garzón is an actress, known for Por un tiempo (2013), Güelcom (2011) and Dead Man Tells His Own Tale (2016).
biography.name: Tamara Garzón

biography.bio: Ana Katz was born on November 2, 1975 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She is an actress and director, known for La fiancée errante (2007), My Friend from the Park (2015) and Musical Chairs (2002). She has been married to Daniel Hendler since 2007. They have two children.
biography.name: Ana Katz

biography.bio: Esteban Lamothe was born on April 30, 1977 in Florentino Ameghino, Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is an actor, known for Guapas (2014), El estudiante ou récit d'une jeunesse révoltée (2011) and Farsantes (2013).
biography.name: Esteban Lamothe

biography.bio: Marcos Montes was born on December 26, 1967 in South America as Marcos Esteban Montes. He is an actor and casting director, known for Garage Olimpo (1999), La fiancée errante (2007) and Vol Whisky Romeo Zulu (2004).
biography.name: Marcos Montes

biography.bio: Mirella Pascual is an actress, known for Whisky (2004), Le dernier été de la Boyita (2009) and Miss Tacuarembó (2010).
biography.name: Mirella Pascual

biography.placeOfBirth: Lomas de Zamora, Buenos Aires, Argentina
biography.bio: Sergio Surraco was born on August 16, 1978 in Lomas de Zamora, Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is an actor, known for Herederos de una venganza (2011), Young Lovers (2001) and Cain y Abel (2010).
biography.name: Sergio Surraco

biography.placeOfBirth: Villa Crespo, Buenos Aires City, Distrito Federal, Argentina
biography.bio: Sebastián Wainraich was born on May 23, 1974 in Villa Crespo, Buenos Aires City, Distrito Federal, Argentina as Sebastián Marcelo Wainraich. He is a writer and actor, known for La biblia y el calefón (1997), Televisión registrada (1999) and Una noche de amor (2016).
biography.name: Sebastián Wainraich
